itemListElement.name: Kale Potato Tacos with Cilantro Cream Sauce

@graph.headline: Kale Potato Tacos with Cilantro Cream Sauce

@graph.name: Dora S.
@graph.description: Dora is the founder, recipe developer, and photographer at Dora's Table and Mi Mero Mole. Born and raised in Mexico and a graduate of the Culinary Institute of America in New York, she adopted a vegan (plant-based) diet to take control of her health.

@graph.name: Kale and Potato Tacos & Cilantro Cream Sauce
@graph.description: These kale potato tacos topped with cilantro cream sauce are the easiest thing in the world to make, they are also delicious and nutritious.
recipeIngredient: 2 1/2 cups (1 lb.) Diced potatoes (I used fingerlings)
3 cups Dinosaur kale or other leafy green
1/2  cup Raw cashews soaked for 3 hours

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large sauté pan to medium heat, add oil and onion. When the onion is translucent and tender add the potatoes.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat a large sauté pan to medium heat, add oil and onion. When the onion is translucent and tender add the potatoes.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook for approximately 10 minutes or until the onion and potatoes are golden brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook for approximately 10 minutes or until the onion and potatoes are golden brown.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the kale and salt and continue cooking until the kale and potatoes are tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the kale and salt and continue cooking until the kale and potatoes are tender.

recipeInstructions.text: In the meantime, place the onion, soaked cashews, cilantro, chile serrano, lime juice, water, and salt in the blender and process until smooth. Taste and adjust seasoning as necessary.
recipeInstructions.name: In the meantime, place the onion, soaked cashews, cilantro, chile serrano, lime juice, water, and salt in the blender and process until smooth. Taste and adjust seasoning as necessary.

recipeInstructions.text: To make the tacos, heat the corn tortillas, add 2-3 tbsp. of the kale and potato mixture and top with a tsp. of cilantro cream sauce.
recipeInstructions.name: To make the tacos, heat the corn tortillas, add 2-3 tbsp. of the kale and potato mixture and top with a tsp. of cilantro cream sauce.

@graph.keywords: cilantro cream sauce, kale potato taco, potato tacos, vegan potato tacos
